name: Fetch_Post_Workflow
description: A workflow to fetch a post from the JSONPlaceholder API.

transitions.name: initialize_fetch_post
transitions.description: Initialize the fetching of a post

externalized_processors.name: process_initialize_fetch_post
externalized_processors.description: Process to initialize fetching of the post

transitions.name: fetch_post_data
transitions.description: Fetch data from the post API
transitions.end_state_description: The post data has been received

externalized_processors.name: process_fetch_post_data
externalized_processors.description: Process to fetch post data from the API
